short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides YouTube's annoying scrubber button until you hover over the progress bar, just like it used to be (and should be).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube's always-visible scrubber button is annoying. This extension returns the old behavior where the scrubber only appears when hovering over the progress bar.
